## blockRendering.RenderInfo.alignStatementRow\_() method

Align the elements of a statement row based on computed bounds. Unlike other types of rows, statement rows add space in multiple places.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected alignStatementRow_(row: InputRow): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  row | [InputRow](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.inputrow_class.md) | The statement row to resize. |

**Returns:**

void
